channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Crimetime
channel.desc: A crime series actress returns to her home town where she encounters her first real case. Can her TV crime knowledge save the day? Mystery drama with Lyndie Greenwood.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love In Whitbrooke
channel.desc: A project manager must choose between nurturing a blooming romance in her small hometown in the USA and moving to London to pursue her dream job.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Junebug
channel.desc: 40-year-old book editor Juniper is magically reconnected with an eight-year-old version of herself who questions her life choices, including the dream of writing her own stories.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Paris Proposal
channel.desc: When two colleagues are mistaken for a couple, they must keep up appearances to not disappoint their biggest client. But could their little white lie turn into something more.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Pinch Of Portugal
channel.desc: When a celebrity chef walks off his show, prep cook Anna must step into the spotlight and make the show her own, with the help of her Aussie cameraman and Portuguese location scout.

channel.title: Falling Together

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Scottish Love Scheme
channel.desc: Lily travels to Scotland and meets Logan, a childhood family friend, where their mothers are hatching a plan to get them together, once and for all. Steamy romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Branching Out
channel.desc: A single mum tracks down her daughter's biological father in a wild journey of trust, love and hope. As Ruby connects with her dad, could Amelia also be meeting the one.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Luckless In Love
channel.desc: A blogger is offered her own column after her post about a terrible date goes viral. But there's a catch - to keep writing good content, she needs to keep seeing the bad date.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Reluctant Royal
channel.desc: When Philly mechanic Johnny learns that his long-lost father is a duke, he reluctantly enters the world of royalty. Starring Emilie de Ravin.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Story Of Love
channel.desc: An aspiring romance novelist wonders if she has been writing the wrong kinds of stories when she is shown the beauty of nature by a charming hotel owner on a retreat.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: An Easter Bloom
channel.desc: Struggling to save her farm, a woman enters a floral design contest, where she develops a blossoming romance with a local pastor.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sweet As Pie
channel.desc: When Tamara visits her family's apple orchard, she reconnects with her childhood best friend and together they fight - armed with pastry and passion - to keep the orchard alive.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Paging Mr. Darcy
channel.desc: A mutual love of Jane Austen's stories causes an overly serious scholar and an actor playing Mr Darcy to fall head over heels into their own fairy tale romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Our Take On Love
channel.desc: When fashion designer Isabella and filmmaker Blake work together to capture a love story from the past, they start to find romance in their present too.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sense And Sensibility
channel.desc: In this period adaptation of the Jane Austen classic, Marianne is torn between two potential suitors, while Elinor pines for a man beyond reach. Romantic drama.
